AddDcdnDomain.title: AddDcdnDomain
AddDcdnDomain.summary: Adds a domain name to accelerate. You can specify only one domain name in each request.

AddDcdnIpaDomain.title: AddDcdnIpaDomain
AddDcdnIpaDomain.summary: Adds a domain name to IPA. You can specify only one domain name in each request.

BatchAddDcdnDomain.title: BatchAddDcdnDomain
BatchAddDcdnDomain.summary: Adds domain names to Dynamic Content Delivery Network (DCDN).

BatchCreateDcdnWafRules.title: BatchCreateDcdnWafRules
BatchCreateDcdnWafRules.summary: Creates Web Application Firewall (WAF) protection rules.

BatchDeleteDcdnDomainConfigs.title: BatchDeleteDcdnDomainConfigs
BatchDeleteDcdnDomainConfigs.summary: Deletes configurations of multiple accelerated domain names at a time.

BatchDeleteDcdnWafRules.title: BatchDeleteDcdnWafRules
BatchDeleteDcdnWafRules.summary: Deletes multiple Web Application Firewall (WAF) protection rules at a time.

BatchModifyDcdnWafRules.title: BatchModifyDcdnWafRules
BatchModifyDcdnWafRules.summary: Modifies multiple Web Application Firewall (WAF) protection rules. Only Bot management rules can be modified.

BatchPutDcdnKv.title: BatchPutDcdnKv
BatchPutDcdnKv.summary: Adds key-value pairs to a namespace.

BatchSetDcdnDomainCertificate.title: BatchSetDcdnDomainCertificate
BatchSetDcdnDomainCertificate.summary: Configures the SSL certificate and modifies the certificate information for multiple accelerated domain names at a time.

BatchSetDcdnDomainConfigs.title: BatchSetDcdnDomainConfigs
BatchSetDcdnDomainConfigs.summary: Configures features for one or more domain names.

BatchSetDcdnIpaDomainConfigs.title: BatchSetDcdnIpaDomainConfigs
BatchSetDcdnIpaDomainConfigs.summary: Configures multiple domain names to be accelerated by IP Application Accelerator (IPA).

BatchSetDcdnWafDomainConfigs.title: BatchSetDcdnWafDomainConfigs
BatchSetDcdnWafDomainConfigs.summary: Sets the protection status of multiple domain names at a time.

BatchStartDcdnDomain.title: BatchStartDcdnDomain
BatchStartDcdnDomain.summary: Enables one or more accelerated domain names. After the accelerated domain names are enabled, the value of the DomainStatus parameter for the domain names changes to Online.

BatchStopDcdnDomain.title: BatchStopDcdnDomain
BatchStopDcdnDomain.summary: Disables one or more accelerated domain names. After an accelerated domain name is disabled, the value of the DomainStatus parameter for the domain name changes to Offline.

CheckDcdnProjectExist.title: CheckDcdnProjectExist
CheckDcdnProjectExist.summary: Checks whether a real-time log delivery project exists.

CommitStagingRoutineCode.title: CommitStagingRoutineCode
CommitStagingRoutineCode.summary:
Generates an official code version from unstable JavaScript code that is in the staging
                  environment. The version can be used in the canary release or production environment.

CreateDcdnDeliverTask.title: CreateDcdnDeliverTask
CreateDcdnDeliverTask.summary: Creates a tracking task. After you create a tracking task, the system periodically sends operations reports to you by email.

CreateDcdnSLSRealTimeLogDelivery.title: CreateDcdnSLSRealTimeLogDelivery
CreateDcdnSLSRealTimeLogDelivery.summary: Creates a real-time log delivery project.

CreateDcdnWafGroup.title: CreateDcdnWafGroup
CreateDcdnWafGroup.summary: Create a custom WAF rule group.

CreateDcdnWafPolicy.title: CreateDcdnWafPolicy
CreateDcdnWafPolicy.summary: Creates a Web Application Firewall (WAF) protection policy.

CreateSlrAndSlsProject.title: CreateSlrAndSlsProject
CreateSlrAndSlsProject.summary: Creates a service-linked role (SLR) and a Log Service project.

DeleteDcdnDeliverTask.title: DeleteDcdnDeliverTask
DeleteDcdnDeliverTask.summary: Deletes tracking tasks by task ID.

DeleteDcdnDomain.title: DeleteDcdnDomain
DeleteDcdnDomain.summary: Deletes a specified accelerated domain name.

DeleteDcdnIpaDomain.title: DeleteDcdnIpaDomain
DeleteDcdnIpaDomain.summary: Deletes an accelerated domain name from IP Application Accelerator (IPA).

DeleteDcdnIpaSpecificConfig.title: DeleteDcdnIpaSpecificConfig
DeleteDcdnIpaSpecificConfig.summary: Deletes specific configurations of an accelerated domain name from IP Application Accelerator (IPA).

DeleteDcdnKv.title: DeleteDcdnKv
DeleteDcdnKv.summary: Deletes the key-value pairs in a namespace that you specify when you call the PutDcdnKvNamespace operation (~~405087~~). EdgeKV provides a global key-value database for Dynamic Route for CDN (DCDN) points of presence (POPs).

DeleteDcdnKvNamespace.title: DeleteDcdnKvNamespace
DeleteDcdnKvNamespace.summary: Deletes a namespace that belongs to your account. The namespace is specified when you call the \\[PutDcdnKvNamespace]\\(~~405087~~) operation.

DeleteDcdnRealTimeLogProject.title: DeleteDcdnRealTimeLogProject
DeleteDcdnRealTimeLogProject.summary: Deletes real-time logs of a project.

DeleteDcdnSpecificConfig.title: DeleteDcdnSpecificConfig
DeleteDcdnSpecificConfig.summary: Deletes configurations of a domain name.

DeleteDcdnSpecificStagingConfig.title: DeleteDcdnSpecificStagingConfig
DeleteDcdnSpecificStagingConfig.summary: Deletes the configurations of an accelerated domain name in the canary release environment.

DeleteDcdnWafGroup.title: DeleteDcdnWafGroup
DeleteDcdnWafGroup.summary: Deletes a custom WAF rule group.

DeleteRoutineCodeRevision.title: DeleteRoutineCodeRevision
DeleteRoutineCodeRevision.summary: Deletes the code of the specified version from a routine.

DeleteRoutineConfEnvs.title: DeleteRoutineConfEnvs
DeleteRoutineConfEnvs.summary: Deletes canary release environments from a routine.

DescribeDcdnBgpBpsData.title: DescribeDcdnBgpBpsData
DescribeDcdnBgpBpsData.summary: Queries bandwidth data for Border Gateway Protocol (BGP) accelerated domain names. Data is collected every 5 minutes.

DescribeDcdnBgpTrafficData.title: DescribeDcdnBgpTrafficData
DescribeDcdnBgpTrafficData.summary: Queries traffic data for BGP accelerated domain names. Data is collected every 5 minutes.

DescribeDcdnBlockedRegions.title: DescribeDcdnBlockedRegions
DescribeDcdnBlockedRegions.summary: Queries countries and regions that can be added to the blacklist.

DescribeDcdnCertificateList.title: DescribeDcdnCertificateList
DescribeDcdnCertificateList.summary: Queries the certificates of one or more accelerated domain names.

DescribeDcdnDdosService.title: DescribeDcdnDdosService
DescribeDcdnDdosService.summary: Queries the status of DCDN DDoS mitigation.

DescribeDcdnDdosSpecInfo.title: DescribeDcdnDdosSpecInfo
DescribeDcdnDdosSpecInfo.summary: Queries the specifications of DCDN DDoS versions.

DescribeDcdnDeletedDomains.title: DescribeDcdnDeletedDomains
DescribeDcdnDeletedDomains.summary: Queries the domain names that are deleted from your Alibaba Cloud account.

DescribeDcdnDeliverList.title: DescribeDcdnDeliverList
DescribeDcdnDeliverList.summary: Queries all tracking tasks of operations reports.

DescribeDcdnDomainBpsData.title: DescribeDcdnDomainBpsData
DescribeDcdnDomainBpsData.summary: Queries the monitoring data of network bandwidth for one or more accelerated domain names. You can query data in the last 90 days.

DescribeDcdnDomainBpsDataByLayer.title: DescribeDcdnDomainBpsDataByLayer
DescribeDcdnDomainBpsDataByLayer.summary: Queries bandwidth data of accelerated domain names.

DescribeDcdnDomainByCertificate.title: DescribeDcdnDomainByCertificate
DescribeDcdnDomainByCertificate.summary: Queries accelerated domain names by SSL certificate.

DescribeDcdnDomainCertificateInfo.title: DescribeDcdnDomainCertificateInfo
DescribeDcdnDomainCertificateInfo.summary: Queries the certificate information about an accelerated domain name.

DescribeDcdnDomainCname.title: DescribeDcdnDomainCname
DescribeDcdnDomainCname.summary: Checks whether CNAME records are configured for one or more accelerated domain names.

DescribeDcdnDomainConfigs.title: DescribeDcdnDomainConfigs
DescribeDcdnDomainConfigs.summary: Queries the configurations of an accelerated domain name.

DescribeDcdnDomainDetail.title: DescribeDcdnDomainDetail
DescribeDcdnDomainDetail.summary: Queries the basic configuration information about an accelerated domain name.

DescribeDcdnDomainHitRateData.title: DescribeDcdnDomainHitRateData
DescribeDcdnDomainHitRateData.summary: Queries the byte hit ratios for an accelerated domain name.

DescribeDcdnDomainHttpCodeData.title: DescribeDcdnDomainHttpCodeData
DescribeDcdnDomainHttpCodeData.summary: Queries the total number and proportions of HTTP status codes returned from one or more accelerated domain names. Data is collected every 5 minutes. You can query data in the last 90 days.

DescribeDcdnDomainHttpCodeDataByLayer.title: DescribeDcdnDomainHttpCodeDataByLayer
DescribeDcdnDomainHttpCodeDataByLayer.summary: Queries the distribution of HTTP status codes by protocol.

DescribeDcdnDomainIpaBpsData.title: DescribeDcdnDomainIpaBpsData
DescribeDcdnDomainIpaBpsData.summary: Queries bandwidth of accelerated domain names for which Layer 4 acceleration is enabled. You can query the data that is collected over the last 90 days.

DescribeDcdnDomainIpaConnData.title: DescribeDcdnDomainIpaConnData
DescribeDcdnDomainIpaConnData.summary: Queries the number of IPA user connections.

DescribeDcdnDomainIpaTrafficData.title: DescribeDcdnDomainIpaTrafficData
DescribeDcdnDomainIpaTrafficData.summary: Queries traffic of one or more accelerated domain names for which Layer 4 acceleration is enabled. You can query the data that is collected over the last 90 days.

DescribeDcdnDomainIspData.title: DescribeDcdnDomainIspData
DescribeDcdnDomainIspData.summary: Queries data statistics about accelerated domain names by Internet service provider (ISP). You can query the data that is collected over the last 90 days.

DescribeDcdnDomainLog.title: DescribeDcdnDomainLog
DescribeDcdnDomainLog.summary: Queries the address where you can download the log data of a domain name.

DescribeDcdnDomainMultiUsageData.title: DescribeDcdnDomainMultiUsageData
DescribeDcdnDomainMultiUsageData.summary: Queries the billable items of accelerated domain names. The data is collected at least every 5 minutes. The billable items do not include non-request items.

DescribeDcdnDomainOriginBpsData.title: DescribeDcdnDomainOriginBpsData
DescribeDcdnDomainOriginBpsData.summary: Queries back-to-origin bandwidth for one or more accelerated domains.

DescribeDcdnDomainOriginTrafficData.title: DescribeDcdnDomainOriginTrafficData
DescribeDcdnDomainOriginTrafficData.summary: Queries the back-to-origin traffic of one or more accelerated domain names.

DescribeDcdnDomainProperty.title: DescribeDcdnDomainProperty
DescribeDcdnDomainProperty.summary: Queries the protocol type of IP Application Accelerator (IPA).

DescribeDcdnDomainPvData.title: DescribeDcdnDomainPvData
DescribeDcdnDomainPvData.summary: Queries page view (PV) data of an accelerated domain name. Data can be collected at minimum intervals of one hour.

DescribeDcdnDomainQpsData.title: DescribeDcdnDomainQpsData
DescribeDcdnDomainQpsData.summary: You can call this operation to query the number of queries per second (QPS) for one or more accelerated domains.

DescribeDcdnDomainQpsDataByLayer.title: DescribeDcdnDomainQpsDataByLayer
DescribeDcdnDomainQpsDataByLayer.summary: Queries the number of queries per second (QPS) for accelerated domain names.

DescribeDcdnDomainRealTimeBpsData.title: DescribeDcdnDomainRealTimeBpsData
DescribeDcdnDomainRealTimeBpsData.summary: Queries bandwidth data of one or more accelerated domain names.

DescribeDcdnDomainRealTimeByteHitRateDat.title: DescribeDcdnDomainRealTimeByteHitRateData
DescribeDcdnDomainRealTimeByteHitRateDat.summary: Queries byte hit ratios at a time granularity of 1 minute.

DescribeDcdnDomainRealTimeDetailData.title: DescribeDcdnDomainRealTimeDetailData
DescribeDcdnDomainRealTimeDetailData.summary: Queries traffic usage through each Internet service provider (ISP) and the number of visits in each region. The resolution of the data is one minute. The maximum time range to query for this operation is 10 minutes.

DescribeDcdnDomainRealTimeHttpCodeData.title: DescribeDcdnDomainRealTimeHttpCodeData
DescribeDcdnDomainRealTimeHttpCodeData.summary: Queries the total number and proportions of HTTP status codes returned from one or more accelerated domain names.

DescribeDcdnDomainRealTimeQpsData.title: DescribeDcdnDomainRealTimeQpsData
DescribeDcdnDomainRealTimeQpsData.summary: The number of QPS for one or more accelerated domain names is queried. Data is collected every minute.

DescribeDcdnDomainRealTimeReqHitRateData.title: DescribeDcdnDomainRealTimeReqHitRateData
DescribeDcdnDomainRealTimeReqHitRateData.summary: Queries the request hit rates with a time granularity of 1 minute.

DescribeDcdnDomainRealTimeSrcBpsData.title: DescribeDcdnDomainRealTimeSrcBpsData
DescribeDcdnDomainRealTimeSrcBpsData.summary: Queries the bandwidth data of back-to-origin requests. Data is collected every minute. You can query data collected in the last 7 days.

DescribeDcdnDomainRealTimeSrcHttpCodeDat.title: DescribeDcdnDomainRealTimeSrcHttpCodeData
DescribeDcdnDomainRealTimeSrcHttpCodeDat.summary: Queries the proportions of HTTP status codes based on back-to-origin statistics with a time granularity of one minute.

DescribeDcdnDomainRealTimeSrcTrafficData.title: DescribeDcdnDomainRealTimeSrcTrafficData
DescribeDcdnDomainRealTimeSrcTrafficData.summary: Queries the origin traffic monitoring data for an accelerated domain name. Data is collected every minute. You can query data in the last 90 days.

DescribeDcdnDomainRealTimeTrafficData.title: DescribeDcdnDomainRealTimeTrafficData
DescribeDcdnDomainRealTimeTrafficData.summary: Queries the traffic monitoring data of an accelerated domain name. Data is collected every minute.

DescribeDcdnDomainRegionData.title: DescribeDcdnDomainRegionData
DescribeDcdnDomainRegionData.summary: Queries regional distribution of users. Data is collected every day. You can query data within the last 90 days.

DescribeDcdnDomainStagingConfig.title: DescribeDcdnDomainStagingConfig
DescribeDcdnDomainStagingConfig.summary: Queries the environment configuration in the canary release environment.

DescribeDcdnDomainTopReferVisit.title: DescribeDcdnDomainTopReferVisit
DescribeDcdnDomainTopReferVisit.summary: Queries and sorts frequently requested web pages on a specified day. You can query data collected within the last 90 days.

DescribeDcdnDomainTopUrlVisit.title: DescribeDcdnDomainTopUrlVisit
DescribeDcdnDomainTopUrlVisit.summary: Queries frequently requested URLs on a day.

DescribeDcdnDomainTrafficData.title: DescribeDcdnDomainTrafficData
DescribeDcdnDomainTrafficData.summary: Queries the network traffic of accelerated domain names. You can query data collected in the last 90 days.

DescribeDcdnDomainUsageData.title: DescribeDcdnDomainUsageData
DescribeDcdnDomainUsageData.summary: Queries resource usage about domain names in a billable region.

DescribeDcdnDomainUvData.title: DescribeDcdnDomainUvData
DescribeDcdnDomainUvData.summary: Queries the number of unique visitors (UVs) to an accelerated domain name. Data is collected every hour. You can query data within the last 90 days.

DescribeDcdnDomainWebsocketBpsData.title: DescribeDcdnDomainWebsocketBpsData
DescribeDcdnDomainWebsocketBpsData.summary: Queries bandwidth of one or more accelerated domain names for which WebSocket is enabled. You can query the data that is collected over the last 90 days.

DescribeDcdnDomainWebsocketHttpCodeData.title: DescribeDcdnDomainWebsocketHttpCodeData
DescribeDcdnDomainWebsocketHttpCodeData.summary: The total number and proportions of HTTP status codes returned from one or more accelerated domain names for which WebSocket is enabled are queried. Data can be collected at minimum intervals of 5 minutes.

DescribeDcdnDomainWebsocketTrafficData.title: DescribeDcdnDomainWebsocketTrafficData
DescribeDcdnDomainWebsocketTrafficData.summary: Queries the traffic monitoring data for an accelerated domain name with WebSocket enabled. You can query data in the last 90 days.

DescribeDcdnDomainsBySource.title: DescribeDcdnDomainsBySource
DescribeDcdnDomainsBySource.summary: Queries DCDN-accelerated domain names by origin server.

DescribeDcdnErUsageData.title: DescribeDcdnErUsageData
DescribeDcdnErUsageData.summary: Queries the number of times that a routine is executed within a specified period of time.

DescribeDcdnFullDomainsBlockIPConfig.title: DescribeDcdnFullDomainsBlockIPConfig
DescribeDcdnFullDomainsBlockIPConfig.summary: Queries the configurations of blocked IP addresses.

DescribeDcdnHttpsDomainList.title: DescribeDcdnHttpsDomainList
DescribeDcdnHttpsDomainList.summary: Queries information about all certificates that belong to your account.

DescribeDcdnIpInfo.title: DescribeDcdnIpInfo
DescribeDcdnIpInfo.summary: Queries whether an IP address belongs to a POP.

DescribeDcdnIpaDomainCidr.title: DescribeDcdnIpaDomainCidr
DescribeDcdnIpaDomainCidr.summary: Queries the back-to-origin CIDR blocks of IPA-accelerated domain names. If you want to call this API operation, you must submit a ticket to apply for the required permissions.

DescribeDcdnIpaDomainConfigs.title: DescribeDcdnIpaDomainConfigs
DescribeDcdnIpaDomainConfigs.summary: Queries the configurations of an accelerated domain name. You can query the configurations of one or more features in each request.

DescribeDcdnIpaDomainDetail.title: DescribeDcdnIpaDomainDetail
DescribeDcdnIpaDomainDetail.summary: Queries the basic configuration information about an accelerated domain name.

DescribeDcdnIpaService.title: DescribeDcdnIpaService
DescribeDcdnIpaService.summary: Queries the status of IPA. The information includes the time when the service was activated, the current service status, the current billing method, and the billing method of the next cycle.

DescribeDcdnIpaUserDomains.title: DescribeDcdnIpaUserDomains
DescribeDcdnIpaUserDomains.summary: The information about all IPA-accelerated domain names within your Alibaba Cloud account is queried.

DescribeDcdnKvAccount.title: DescribeDcdnKvAccount
DescribeDcdnKvAccount.summary: Queries the information about the key-value pairs that belong to your account.

DescribeDcdnKvAccountStatus.title: DescribeDcdnKvAccountStatus
DescribeDcdnKvAccountStatus.summary: Queries the KV status of an account.

DescribeDcdnKvNamespace.title: DescribeDcdnKvNamespace
DescribeDcdnKvNamespace.summary: Queries the information about a namespace.

DescribeDcdnL2Ips.title: DescribeDcdnL2Ips
DescribeDcdnL2Ips.summary: Queries CIDR blocks of Alibaba Cloud Dynamic Content Delivery Network points of presence (DCDN POPs) that are used for dynamic content delivery.

DescribeDcdnL2Vips.title: DescribeDcdnL2Vips
DescribeDcdnL2Vips.summary: Queries the origin CIDR blocks by domain name. The CIDR blocks include IPv4 and IPv6 CIDR blocks.

DescribeDcdnOriginSiteHealthStatus.title: DescribeDcdnOriginSiteHealthStatus
DescribeDcdnOriginSiteHealthStatus.summary: Queries the status of the origin server for a DCDN-accelerated domain name.

DescribeDcdnRealTimeDeliveryField.title: DescribeDcdnRealTimeDeliveryField
DescribeDcdnRealTimeDeliveryField.summary: Queries the fields in real-time log entries.

DescribeDcdnRefreshQuota.title: DescribeDcdnRefreshQuota
DescribeDcdnRefreshQuota.summary: Queries the maximum number and the remaining number of URLs and directories that can be refreshed or the maximum number and the remaining number of URLs that can be prefetched per day.

DescribeDcdnRefreshTaskById.title: DescribeDcdnRefreshTaskById
DescribeDcdnRefreshTaskById.summary: Queries the status of refresh or prefetch tasks by task ID.

DescribeDcdnRefreshTasks.title: DescribeDcdnRefreshTasks
DescribeDcdnRefreshTasks.summary: Queries the refresh or prefetch tasks. You can query the tasks in the last three days.

DescribeDcdnRegionAndIsp.title: DescribeDcdnRegionAndIsp
DescribeDcdnRegionAndIsp.summary: Queries the list of Internet service providers (ISPs) and regions.

DescribeDcdnReport.title: DescribeDcdnReport
DescribeDcdnReport.summary: Queries the content of an operations report.

DescribeDcdnSLSRealTimeLogType.title: DescribeDcdnSLSRealTimeLogType
DescribeDcdnSLSRealTimeLogType.summary: Queries supported types of real-time logs.

DescribeDcdnSLSRealtimeLogDelivery.title: DescribeDcdnSLSRealtimeLogDelivery
DescribeDcdnSLSRealtimeLogDelivery.summary: Queries a real-time log delivery project.

DescribeDcdnSMCertificateDetail.title: DescribeDcdnSMCertificateDetail
DescribeDcdnSMCertificateDetail.summary: Queries the details about a ShangMi (SM) certificate.

DescribeDcdnSMCertificateList.title: DescribeDcdnSMCertificateList
DescribeDcdnSMCertificateList.summary: Queries the ShangMi (SM) certificates of an accelerated domain name.

DescribeDcdnSecFuncInfo.title: DescribeDcdnSecFuncInfo
DescribeDcdnSecFuncInfo.summary: Creates an edge security drop-down list in the Dynamic Content Delivery Network (DCDN) console.

DescribeDcdnSecSpecInfo.title: DescribeDcdnSecSpecInfo
DescribeDcdnSecSpecInfo.summary: Queries the version of secure Dynamic Route for CDN (DCDN) and the security rules.

DescribeDcdnService.title: DescribeDcdnService
DescribeDcdnService.summary: Queries information about the Dynamic Content Delivery Network (DCDN) service. The information includes the time when the service was activated, the current service status, the current billing method, and the billing method of the next cycle.

DescribeDcdnStagingIp.title: DescribeDcdnStagingIp
DescribeDcdnStagingIp.summary: Queries valid virtual IP addresses (VIPs) in the staging environment.

DescribeDcdnTagResources.title: DescribeDcdnTagResources
DescribeDcdnTagResources.summary: Queries the tags of one or more resources.

DescribeDcdnTopDomainsByFlow.title: DescribeDcdnTopDomainsByFlow
DescribeDcdnTopDomainsByFlow.summary: Queries domain names ranked by network traffic. You can query data within the last 90 days.

DescribeDcdnUserBillHistory.title: DescribeDcdnUserBillHistory
DescribeDcdnUserBillHistory.summary: Queries the billing records of an Alibaba Cloud account. The maximum time range that you can specify is one month.

DescribeDcdnUserBillType.title: DescribeDcdnUserBillType
DescribeDcdnUserBillType.summary: Queries the metering method that is used in Dynamic Content Delivery Network (DCDN).

DescribeDcdnUserCertificateExpireCount.title: DescribeDcdnUserCertificateExpireCount
DescribeDcdnUserCertificateExpireCount.summary: Queries the number of domain names whose SSL certificates are about to expire or have already expired.

DescribeDcdnUserConfigs.title: DescribeDcdnUserConfigs
DescribeDcdnUserConfigs.summary: Queries the configurations of security features.

DescribeDcdnUserDomains.title: DescribeDcdnUserDomains
DescribeDcdnUserDomains.summary: Queries the accelerated domain names that belong to your Alibaba Cloud account. You can filter domains by name or by status. Fuzzy match is supported when you filter domains by name.

DescribeDcdnUserDomainsByFunc.title: DescribeDcdnUserDomainsByFunc
DescribeDcdnUserDomainsByFunc.summary: Queries all accelerated domain names with specified features configured that belong to your Alibaba Cloud account based on the FuncId parameter.

DescribeDcdnUserQuota.title: DescribeDcdnUserQuota
DescribeDcdnUserQuota.summary: Queries the resource quotas and the used resources.

DescribeDcdnUserRealTimeDeliveryField.title: DescribeDcdnUserRealTimeDeliveryField
DescribeDcdnUserRealTimeDeliveryField.summary: Queries the fields that are selected.

DescribeDcdnUserResourcePackage.title: DescribeDcdnUserResourcePackage
DescribeDcdnUserResourcePackage.summary: Queries information about the resource plans in your Alibaba Cloud account.

DescribeDcdnUserSecDrop.title: DescribeDcdnUserSecDrop
DescribeDcdnUserSecDrop.summary: Queries the number of packets blocked by a specified security feature.

DescribeDcdnUserSecDropByMinute.title: DescribeDcdnUserSecDropByMinute
DescribeDcdnUserSecDropByMinute.summary: Queries the number of packets that are blocked by security features at the application layer within a specific time range.

DescribeDcdnUserVipsByDomain.title: DescribeDcdnUserVipsByDomain
DescribeDcdnUserVipsByDomain.summary: Queries virtual IP addresses of the POPs by domain name.

DescribeDcdnVerifyContent.title: DescribeDcdnVerifyContent
DescribeDcdnVerifyContent.summary: Queries the ownership verification content of a domain name.

DescribeDcdnWafBotAppKey.title: DescribeDcdnWafBotAppKey
DescribeDcdnWafBotAppKey.summary: Queries the SDK authentication key for the Alibaba Cloud account. You can also use the SDK authentication key to send SDK initialization requests. The key must be included in the integration code.

DescribeDcdnWafDefaultRules.title: DescribeDcdnWafDefaultRules
DescribeDcdnWafDefaultRules.summary: Queries the default configurations of a WAF rule.

DescribeDcdnWafDomain.title: DescribeDcdnWafDomain
DescribeDcdnWafDomain.summary: Queries domain names that have Web Application Firewall (WAF) enabled and the relevant information, including the status of the access control list (ACL), protection against HTTP flood attacks, domain name, and WAF.

DescribeDcdnWafDomainDetail.title: DescribeDcdnWafDomainDetail
DescribeDcdnWafDomainDetail.summary: Queries the information about the protection policy of a domain name.

DescribeDcdnWafDomains.title: DescribeDcdnWafDomains
DescribeDcdnWafDomains.summary: Queries the accelerated domain names that are protected by Web Application Firewall (WAF). Fuzzy search is supported.

DescribeDcdnWafFilterInfo.title: DescribeDcdnWafFilterInfo
DescribeDcdnWafFilterInfo.summary: Queries the information about match conditions in a custom protection rule, such as the match fields, logical characters, and match content.

DescribeDcdnWafGeoInfo.title: DescribeDcdnWafGeoInfo
DescribeDcdnWafGeoInfo.summary: Queries the countries and regions that can be added to the blacklist of Web Application Firewall (WAF).

DescribeDcdnWafGroup.title: DescribeDcdnWafGroup
DescribeDcdnWafGroup.summary: Queries the details of a custom WAF rule group by page.

DescribeDcdnWafGroups.title: DescribeDcdnWafGroups
DescribeDcdnWafGroups.summary: Queries custom Web Application Firewall (WAF) rule groups.

DescribeDcdnWafLogs.title: DescribeDcdnWafLogs
DescribeDcdnWafLogs.summary: Queries the address from which you can download the Web Application Firewall (WAF) logs of a domain name.

DescribeDcdnWafPolicies.title: DescribeDcdnWafPolicies
DescribeDcdnWafPolicies.summary: Queries the details of the Web Application Firewall (WAF) protection policies that you configured.

DescribeDcdnWafPolicy.title: DescribeDcdnWafPolicy
DescribeDcdnWafPolicy.summary: Queries the details of a protection policy.

DescribeDcdnWafPolicyDomains.title: DescribeDcdnWafPolicyDomains
DescribeDcdnWafPolicyDomains.summary: Queries the accelerated domain names that are protected by a specified Web Application Firewall (WAF) protection policy.

DescribeDcdnWafPolicyValidDomains.title: DescribeDcdnWafPolicyValidDomains
DescribeDcdnWafPolicyValidDomains.summary: Queries the domain names that can be bound to a custom protection policy.

DescribeDcdnWafRule.title: DescribeDcdnWafRule
DescribeDcdnWafRule.summary: Queries the details of a specified protection rule.

DescribeDcdnWafRules.title: DescribeDcdnWafRules
DescribeDcdnWafRules.summary: Queries the details of the protection rules that you configured.

DescribeDcdnWafScenes.title: DescribeDcdnWafScenes
DescribeDcdnWafScenes.summary: Queries the information about the type of the protection policy that you use.

DescribeDcdnWafService.title: DescribeDcdnWafService
DescribeDcdnWafService.summary: Queries the information about Dynamic Content Delivery Network (DCDN) Web Application Firewall WAF), including the time when WAF is enabled, edition of WAF, current status of WAF, metering method for requests, and metering method for rules.

DescribeDcdnWafSpecInfo.title: DescribeDcdnWafSpecInfo
DescribeDcdnWafSpecInfo.summary: Queries the version of Web Application Firewall (WAF) used in Dynamic Content Delivery Network (DCDN).

DescribeDcdnWafUsageData.title: DescribeDcdnWafUsageData
DescribeDcdnWafUsageData.summary: Queries the usage data of Web Application Firewall (WAF).

DescribeDcdnsecService.title: DescribeDcdnsecService
DescribeDcdnsecService.summary: Queries the information about Dynamic Content Delivery Network (DCDN), such as the service activation time, the expiration time, and the current status.

DescribeEncryptRoutineUid.title: DescribeEncryptRoutineUid
DescribeEncryptRoutineUid.summary: Queries the encrypted RoutineUid of a routine.

DescribeHighlightInfo.title: DescribeHighlightInfo
DescribeHighlightInfo.summary: Queries the highlighted data of attack details. You can query the reasons for which requests are blocked based on TraceIDs in logs of requests that are blocked by Basic Web Protection. The highlighted data matches the content blocked by the basic web protection module.

DescribeKvUsageData.title: DescribeKvUsageData
DescribeKvUsageData.summary: Queries the usage data of KV storage.

DescribeRDDomainConfig.title: DescribeRDDomainConfig
DescribeRDDomainConfig.summary: Queries the feature configurations of an accelerated domain name in the resource directory.

DescribeRoutine.title: DescribeRoutine
DescribeRoutine.summary: Queries the metadata of a specified routine. The metadata includes the routine configuration in each environment, configuration version, and code version.

DescribeRoutineCanaryEnvs.title: DescribeRoutineCanaryEnvs
DescribeRoutineCanaryEnvs.summary: Queries the canary release environments that are supported by ER.

DescribeRoutineCodeRevision.title: DescribeRoutineCodeRevision
DescribeRoutineCodeRevision.summary: Queries the JavaScript code version of a routine.

DescribeRoutineRelatedDomains.title: DescribeRoutineRelatedDomains
DescribeRoutineRelatedDomains.summary: Queries the list of domain names associated with EdgeRoutine.

DescribeRoutineSpec.title: DescribeRoutineSpec
DescribeRoutineSpec.summary: Queries the supported specifications for routines. The private preview supports the following CPU time slice specifications: 5 ms, 50 ms, and 100 ms.

DescribeRoutineUserInfo.title: DescribeRoutineUserInfo
DescribeRoutineUserInfo.summary: Queries the subdomains and routines that belong to your Alibaba Cloud account.

DescribeUserDcdnIpaStatus.title: DescribeUserDcdnIpaStatus
DescribeUserDcdnIpaStatus.summary: Whether IPA is enabled and whether you have overdue payments for your IPA are queried.

DescribeUserDcdnStatus.title: DescribeUserDcdnStatus
DescribeUserDcdnStatus.summary: Queries whether DCDN is activated and whether your account has overdue payments.

DescribeUserErStatus.title: DescribeUserErStatus
DescribeUserErStatus.summary: Queries whether EdgeRoutine (ER) is activated or has an overdue payment.

DescribeUserLogserviceStatus.title: DescribeUserLogserviceStatus
DescribeUserLogserviceStatus.summary: Queries whether Log Service is activated and whether you have overdue payments for your Log Service.

EditRoutineConf.title: EditRoutineConf
EditRoutineConf.summary: Modifies the configurations of a routine.

GetDcdnKv.title: GetDcdnKv
GetDcdnKv.summary: Queries the value of a key in a key-value pair.

GetDcdnKvStatus.title: GetDcdnKvStatus
GetDcdnKvStatus.summary: Queries the KV status by key value.

ListDcdnKv.title: ListDcdnKv
ListDcdnKv.summary: Traverses the values of keys in a namespace.

ListDcdnRealTimeDeliveryProject.title: ListDcdnRealTimeDeliveryProject
ListDcdnRealTimeDeliveryProject.summary: Queries information about a real-time log delivery project.

ModifyDcdnWafGroup.title: ModifyDcdnWafGroup
ModifyDcdnWafGroup.summary: Modifies a custom Web Application Firewall (WAF) rule group.

ModifyDcdnWafPolicy.title: ModifyDcdnWafPolicy
ModifyDcdnWafPolicy.summary: Changes the name or the status of a protection policy.

ModifyDcdnWafPolicyDomains.title: ModifyDcdnWafPolicyDomains
ModifyDcdnWafPolicyDomains.summary: Changes the accelerated domain names that are bound to a protection policy.

ModifyDcdnWafRule.title: ModifyDcdnWafRule
ModifyDcdnWafRule.summary: Changes the name, status, or configurations of a protection rule.

PreloadDcdnObjectCaches.title: PreloadDcdnObjectCaches
PreloadDcdnObjectCaches.summary: Prefetches content from origin servers to points of presence (POPs). This reduces workloads on origin servers because users can hit cache upon their first visits.

PublishDcdnStagingConfigToProduction.title: PublishDcdnStagingConfigToProduction
PublishDcdnStagingConfigToProduction.summary: Publishes the configurations of an accelerated domain name from the staging environment to the production environment.

PublishRoutineCodeRevision.title: PublishRoutineCodeRevision
PublishRoutineCodeRevision.summary: Publishes a specified version of routine code to an environment.

PutDcdnKv.title: PutDcdnKv
PutDcdnKv.summary: Sets key-value pairs in a namespace.

RefreshDcdnObjectCaches.title: RefreshDcdnObjectCaches
RefreshDcdnObjectCaches.summary: Refreshes specified objects on points of presence (POPs). The objects can be included in the content of files or URLs. You can refresh multiple URLs in each request.

RollbackDcdnStagingConfig.title: RollbackDcdnStagingConfig
RollbackDcdnStagingConfig.summary: Rolls back the configurations of an accelerated domain name from the staging environment to the production environment.

SetDcdnDomainCertificate.title: SetDcdnDomainCertificate
SetDcdnDomainCertificate.summary: Enables or disables the SSL certificate for a domain name and modifies certificate details.

SetDcdnDomainSMCertificate.title: SetDcdnDomainSMCertificate
SetDcdnDomainSMCertificate.summary: Enables or disables the ShangMi (SM) certificate for a domain name.

SetDcdnDomainSSLCertificate.title: SetDcdnDomainSSLCertificate
SetDcdnDomainSSLCertificate.summary: Enables or disables the SSL certificate for a domain name and updates certificate details.

SetDcdnDomainStagingConfig.title: SetDcdnDomainStagingConfig
SetDcdnDomainStagingConfig.summary: Sets or modifies the domain name configuration in the canary release environment.

SetDcdnFullDomainsBlockIP.title: SetDcdnFullDomainsBlockIP
SetDcdnFullDomainsBlockIP.summary: Configures IP addresses that are blocked or unblocked from accessing resources of Alibaba Cloud Dynamic Content Delivery Network (DCDN).

SetRoutineSubdomain.title: SetRoutineSubdomain
SetRoutineSubdomain.summary: Configures a subdomain for a routine.

StartDcdnDomain.title: StartDcdnDomain
StartDcdnDomain.summary: Enables a specified disabled accelerated domain. After the accelerated domain is enabled, the value of the DomainStatus parameter changes to Online for the domain.

StartDcdnIpaDomain.title: StartDcdnIpaDomain
StartDcdnIpaDomain.summary: Enables one or more accelerated domain names. After the accelerated domain names are enabled, the value of the DomainStatus parameter for the domain names changes to Online.

StopDcdnDomain.title: StopDcdnDomain
StopDcdnDomain.summary:
Disables a specified accelerated domain. After the accelerated domain is disabled,
                  the value of the DomainStatus parameter changes to Offline for the domain.

StopDcdnIpaDomain.title: StopDcdnIpaDomain
StopDcdnIpaDomain.summary: Disables an accelerated domain name. After an accelerated domain name is disabled, the value of the DomainStatus parameter for the domain name changes to Offline.

TagDcdnResources.title: TagDcdnResources
TagDcdnResources.summary: Adds one or more tags to a resource.

UntagDcdnResources.title: UntagDcdnResources
UntagDcdnResources.summary: Removes one or more tags from a resource.

UpdateDcdnDeliverTask.title: UpdateDcdnDeliverTask
UpdateDcdnDeliverTask.summary: Updates a tracking task by task ID.

UpdateDcdnIpaDomain.title: UpdateDcdnIpaDomain
UpdateDcdnIpaDomain.summary: Modifies a domain name that is accelerated by IP Application Accelerator (IPA).

UpdateDcdnSLSRealtimeLogDelivery.title: UpdateDcdnSLSRealtimeLogDelivery
UpdateDcdnSLSRealtimeLogDelivery.summary: Updates a real-time log delivery project.

UpdateDcdnSubTask.title: UpdateDcdnSubTask
UpdateDcdnSubTask.summary: Updates one or more operations reports.

UpdateDcdnUserRealTimeDeliveryField.title: UpdateDcdnUserRealTimeDeliveryField
UpdateDcdnUserRealTimeDeliveryField.summary: Updates the fields in real-time log entries.

UploadStagingRoutineCode.title: UploadStagingRoutineCode
UploadStagingRoutineCode.summary: Uploads code to a routine for testing.

VerifyDcdnDomainOwner.title: VerifyDcdnDomainOwner
VerifyDcdnDomainOwner.summary: Verifies the ownership of a domain name.
